import React, { Component } from "react"; import axios from 'axios' class SignUp extends Component { state={ accountMade:false, OTP: false } submitForm = (event) => { event.preventDefault() const data={ email: event.target.email.value, password:event.target.password.value } var xhr = new XMLHttpRequest(); axios.post("http://localhost:8080/signup",data) .then(response=> { if (response.data) { console.log(response) axios.post("http://localhost:8081/sendmail",data) .then(response1=>console.log(response1.data)) .catch(error1=>console.log("send mail failed",error1)) this.setState({accountMade:true}) } else{ this.setState({accountMade:false}) alert("Accont already made...Kindly login") } }) .catch(error=>console.log(console.error())) }; render() { var body="" if(this.state.accountMade){ body=

Account created successfully

Please login

} else{ body=










} return ( {body} ); } } export default SignUp;
